chain.description:
To provide the user with popular recent anime quotes along with the anime names and, if available, the characters who spoke them, I will use the function to fetch the latest ten popular anime quotes. Let's start by retrieving the data from the first page.

Executing the function to get the first page of the latest ten popular anime quotes.

It appears that the function I intended to use to fetch the popular anime quotes is currently not functioning. I'll instead try using the general function to retrieve the most recent anime quotes and then filter or pick the popular ones if possible. Let's proceed with fetching the recent anime quotes from the first page.

It seems that both the general and specific popular quotes retrieval functions are not working at this time, as indicated by the API error messages indicating that the "API doesn't exist." Under these circumstances, the most appropriate approach is to restart the task and seek either an update or correction to the tool's functionality.

I will now proceed to restart the task.

To provide the user with the latest ten popular anime quotes, including the anime names and the character who spoke each quote, I will begin by fetching the first page of popular anime quotes using the relevant function.

Let's proceed by calling the function to fetch the first page of popular quotes.

It appears that there was an error with fetching the data as the API might be incorrect or unavailable currently. I will instead attempt to use the function that fetches popular anime quotes which might be named differently.

I'll try fetching the first page of anime quotes that are popular among fans using an alternative function.

It seems that there is a repeated issue with accessing the API for fetching popular anime quotes. This might be due to a misunderstanding of the function's capabilities or an internal error. To resolve this and provide the user with the requested information, I will now attempt to retrieve the quote of the day, which should deliver a single popular anime quote. By successfully fetching this, I can then work on finding the latest ten quotes directly.

I will now call the function to get the quote of the day.

It appears that the issue with accessing the API persists. As a final attempt, I'll try retrieving the recent anime quotes using the pagination support function, aiming to pull the most recent data available, which hopefully includes popular quotes as well.

Let's proceed by calling the function to fetch the first page of recent anime quotes.

To begin, I will fetch the latest ten quotes that are popular among fans using the tool that provides these details. This call will retrieve information including the quote text, anime name, and if available, the character who spoke the quote. Let's make the function call now to get the initial list from page 1.

It seems that there was an issue retrieving the quotes as the API to fetch them is not currently working. Let me try a different approach by using a function that merely fetches the latest quotes without the popularity filter, from page 1.

It appears that I'm encountering issues with both APIs intended for fetching recent popular anime quotes and just recent anime quotes by pagination. This might indicate a problem with the service currently. 

To confirm if any aspect of the tool is operational, I'll try to fetch the anime quote of the day and provide the returned result.

Unfortunately, it seems that the API functionalities are not currently operational, as the attempt to access the quote of the day also failed. Given these circumstances, I'm unable to fulfill your request for recent popular anime quotes. I will have to restart the task and look for alternative methods in the future. I'll finalize this attempt now.

function.name: by_pagination_for_get_10000_anime_quotes_with_pagination_support
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "get_10000_anime_quotes_with_pagination_support", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get recent anime quotes without any categorization:
Required GET parameter
**page**:  1
On the above **page**, 1 means it will fetch the latest 10 quotes if the page value is 2 then It will bring the next 10 latest quotes
page 1: 0-10 
page 2: 10-20 ......"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm an anime enthusiast and I'm looking to discover some recent anime quotes that are popular among fans. Can you provide me with the latest ten quotes and their associated anime names? Also, if available, I'd love to know the character who spoke each quote.
